snippet: With climate change affecting crops, United Nations officials urged countries to guard against global hunger.
abstract: Directors of three major United Nations food and agriculture programs urge international action to prevent global spikes in food prices from causing global hunger; officials cite climate change and drought as threats that must be addressed both in the short term and long term.
lead_paragraph: With climate change affecting crops, United Nations officials urged countries to guard against global hunger.

headline.seo: Experts Issue a Warning as Food Prices Shoot Up
headline.main: Experts Issue a Warning as Food Prices Shoot Up
headline.print_headline: Experts Issue a Warning As Food Prices Shoot Up
